interestingFact: The United States has the world's largest economy by nominal GDP.
Canada has the longest coastline of any country in the world.
India is the world's largest democracy.
Australia is home to the Great Barrier Reef, the largest coral reef system in the world.
Brazil is home to the Amazon Rainforest, the largest rainforest on Earth.
Big Ben is actually the nickname for the Great Bell inside the Elizabeth Tower.
Germany is known for having over 1,500 different types of sausages.
